name: Duplicata
description:
Made for the GMTK 2020 game jam. Theme: Out Of Control.

A game about cloning yourself to overcome challenges!

Be carefull though, clones shot clones too! And we know than exponential growth is really fast. The situation can quickly get out of control if you don't manage well.

  • Platforming
  • Clone shooting
  • Challenging
  • Puzzling
  • More than 4 and less than 6 leveling
  • Good controlling
  • 1-biting
  • Text everywhering
  • Weird humor as you can seeing

Have fun (hopefully) :)

I sadly wasn't hable to get a Linux build, however it should work with Wine.

Keys not mentionned in-game:

  • Alternative move with WASD/ZQSD.
  • Alternative jump with J/X.
  • Alternative shot with K/C.
  • Fullscreen F11/Alt+Enter.
  • Hide my wonderfull text DEL.
  • Skip a level Ctrl+S (please don't).
  • Quit the game :( ESC.

Assets used:

Featuring xJackFox's music (The Starlit Escape OST).
https://xjackfox.itch.io/

Font 04b03 created by 04.
http://04.jp.org/

Game engine: Game Maker Studio 2.2.
https://www.yoyogames.com/

Sound effects created with sfxr.
https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
